gui module¶

Created on Thu Jan 14 11:19:16 2021

class gui.DominoApp(**kwargs)¶

Bases : kivy.app.App

build()¶

Initializes the application; it will be called only once. If this method returns a widget (tree), it will be used as the root widget and added to the window.

Renvoie

None or a root Widget instance if no self.root exists.

class gui.DominoGame(**kwargs)¶

Bases : kivy.uix.floatlayout.FloatLayout

This is the GUI class where the main windows is created and updated.

Adds a tile to the GUI rendition of a player’s hand.

Paramètres

  • tiles (a list of Tiles to be added to the player's hand.) –

  • index_player (0 if it is the human player, 1 otherwise.) –

play_one_turn(side, tile)¶

Plays one turn of the game: manages the tile selected by the human and then displays the computer’s move. If the computer has no tile to play, the player is warned and it is the end of the turn. If the player can’t play after the first computer move, the computer continues playing tiles until the human player is able to play again.

Paramètres

  • side (the selected side for the player's move (left or right)) –

  • tile (the selected tile for the player's move) –

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

update_buttons_actions_for_placing_tiles(tile)¶

Updates if side selection button action. Called each time a new tile is pressed.

Paramètres

  • index_player (0 if it is the human player, 1 otherwise.) –

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

update_gui_state()¶

Updates the GUI state after each move. First computes the new board_repr (internal board representation used for display) and the displays the tiles according to board_repr.

Paramètres

  • side (the side on which the tile is to be played) –

  • tile (the tile to be played) –

  • index_player (0 if it is the human player, 1 otherwise.) –

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

Called when the user wants to change the background image. This is a sequential run through all the images in the theme folder
